cat > /root/backdoor_id_rsa

Then paste the key content, and save it.

Afterwards, I will set correct permissions and attempt SSH login with this key.

chmod 600 /root/backdoor_id_rsa

ssh -i /root/backdoor_id_rsa backdoor@172.10.0.3
